name: pic word 2018
description:
Pic word 2018 is an app that guesses words through pictures. You can answer the corresponding word through the picture. The app guesses the image is simple and interesting, the application is rich in content, and the text is rich and can be quickly and easily mastered.
Open the app and click Play to start guessing. There are 15 levels. There are 12 questions for each level. You will need to answer your current question to continue to answer the next question. When you answer the question correctly, you can get 5 gold coins. You can also use the hint or skip function. Of course, you need to pay the corresponding gold coins. When the coins are insufficient, you can get more coins by answering more questions or adding a subscription. When answering all questions and levels, you can answer any questions in the app.
